name: devtasks-mcp-server
description: MCP server for basic development commands (install, build, lint, test, ci)

commands.name: install
commands.description: Install all dependencies required for the project. Use this when setting up the project for the first time or when dependencies change.

commands.name: build
commands.description: Build the project. Use this after making changes to source code that require compilation or packaging.

commands.name: lint
commands.description: Lint the codebase. Use this to check for code style and quality issues before committing or pushing changes.

commands.name: test
commands.description: Run all tests. Use this to verify that your code works as expected and nothing is broken.

commands.name: ci
commands.description: Run the full CI pipeline. Use this to perform all checks (formatting, linting, tests) as done in continuous integration.
